messages.title: WE HAVE 24 HOURS TO SAVE OUR NHS
messages.content: Labour will: Recruit 20,000 more nurses, fund 8,000 more GPs, Guarantee cancer tests and results in one week, Create a £2.5 billion Time to Care fund, Cap private profits in the NHS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour proposes to recruit 20,000 more nurses, fund 8,000 more GPs, guarantee cancer tests and results in one week, and create a £2.5 billion Time to Care fund, as well as capping private profits in the NHS.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Staying at home or voting for any other party will let the Tories win.

issues.health: Recruit 20,000 more nurses, fund 8,000 more GPs, guarantee cancer tests and results in one week, create a £2.5 billion Time to Care fund, and cap private profits in the NHS

images.caption: WE HAVE 24 HOURS TO SAVE OUR NHS
TOMORROW OUR NHS NEEDS YOU. WE HAVE 24 HOURS TO SAVE OUR NHS.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The information from the leaflet is repeated on both sides.
